parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned paginations. Defaults to 100.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page of paginated results.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: If set, returned values will be sorted in specific order, defaults to 'asc'.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Name of the field, which result will be ordered by.

get.description: Get OHLC(k line) of specific market.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Time period of K line, default to 1. You can choose between 1, 5, 15, 30, 60, 120, 240, 360, 720, 1440, 4320, 10080

parameters.name: time_from
parameters.description: An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch. If set, only k-line data after that time will be returned.

parameters.name: time_to
parameters.description: An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch. If set, only k-line data till that time will be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned data points default to 30. Ignored if time_from and time_to are given.

200.description: Get OHLC(k line) of specific market.

get.description: Get depth or specified market. Both asks and bids are sorted from highest price to lowest.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned price levels. Default to 300.

200.description: Get depth or specified market. Both asks and bids are sorted from highest price to lowest.

get.description: Get recent trades on market, each trade is included only once. Trades are sorted in reverse creation order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned trades. Default to 100.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch.If set, only trades executed before the time will be returned.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: If set, returned trades will be sorted in specific order, default to 'desc'.

200.description: Get recent trades on market, each trade is included only once. Trades are sorted in reverse creation order.

id.description: Unique withdraw limit table identifier in database.

group.description: Member group for define withdraw limits.

kyc_level.description: KYC level for define withdraw limits.

created_at.description: Withdraw limit table created time in iso8601 format.

updated_at.description: Withdraw limit table updated time in iso8601 format.

WithdrawLimit.description: Returns withdraw limits table as paginated collection

id.description: Unique trading fee table identifier in database.

group.description: Member group for define maker/taker fee.

market_id.description: Market id for define maker/taker fee.

created_at.description: Trading fee table created time in iso8601 format.

updated_at.description: Trading fee table updated time in iso8601 format.

TradingFee.description: Returns trading_fees table as paginated collection

Ticker.description: Get list of all available trading pairs

low.description: The lowest trade price during last 24 hours (0.0 if no trades executed during last 24 hours)

high.description: The highest trade price during last 24 hours (0.0 if no trades executed during last 24 hours)

open.description: Price of the first trade executed 24 hours ago or less

volume.description: Total volume of trades executed during last 24 hours

amount.description: Total amount of trades executed during last 24 hours

avg_price.description: Average price more precisely VWAP is calculated by adding up the total traded for every transaction(price multiplied by the number of shares traded) and then dividing by the total shares traded

price_change_percent.description: Price change in the next format +3.19%.Price change is calculated using next formula (last - open) / open * 100%

fee_currency.description: Currency user's fees were charged in.

fee.description: Percentage of fee user was charged for performed trade.

fee_amount.description: Amount of fee user was charged for performed trade.

created_at.description: Trade create time in iso8601 format.

taker_type.description: Trade taker order type (sell or buy).

OrderBook.description: Get the order book of specified market.

price.description: Price for each unit. e.g.If you want to sell/buy 1 btc at 3000 usd, the price is '3000.0'

avg_price.description: Average execution price, average of price in trades.

state.description: One of 'wait', 'done', or 'cancel'.An order in 'wait' is an active order, waiting fulfillment;a 'done' order is an order fulfilled;'cancel' means the order has been canceled.

market.description: The market in which the order is placed, e.g. 'btcusd'.All available markets can be found at /api/v2/markets.

created_at.description: Order create time in iso8601 format.

updated_at.description: Order updated time in iso8601 format.

origin_volume.description: The amount user want to sell/buy.An order could be partially executed,e.g. an order sell 5 btc can be matched with a buy 3 btc order,left 2 btc to be sold; in this case the order's volume would be '5.0',its remaining_volume would be '2.0', its executed volume is '3.0'.

Order.description: Get your orders, result is paginated.

id.description: Unique market id. It's always in the form of xxxyyy,where xxx is the base currency code, yyy is the quotecurrency code, e.g. 'btcusd'. All available markets canbe found at /api/v2/markets.

state.description: Market state defines if user can see/trade on current market.

position.description: Position used for defining currencies order

min_confirmations.description: Number of confirmations required for confirming deposit or withdrawal

rid.description: The beneficiary ID or wallet address on the Blockchain.

done_at.description: The datetime when withdraw was completed

Withdraw.description: List your withdraws as paginated collection.

name.description: Human rememberable name which refer beneficiary.

data.description: Bank Account details for fiat Beneficiary in JSON format.For crypto it's blockchain address.

state.description: Defines either beneficiary active - user can use it to withdraw moneyor pending - requires beneficiary activation with pin.

sent_at.description: Time when last pin was sent

created_at.description: The datetime when deposit was created.

completed_at.description: The datetime when deposit was completed..

created_at.description: Transaction created time in iso8601 format.

updated_at.description: Transaction updated time in iso8601 format.
